name: The Shadows of Pygmalion
description: For as long as anyone knows, beings called “Puppets” have operated in service of a force unknown, quietly manipulating the course of history. One day, Hajiro Mina has a chance encounter with one of these Puppets, ultimately changing her life forever.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Pentium 4 2.0 GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: At least 1024x768 or 1280x720, High Color DirectX: Version 8.1 Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or Better Processor: Core 2 Duo 2.66 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Full Color Compatible
